backend/main.mo: Main canister defines product, order, inquiry, carousel, user profile, and site content types with in‑memory maps for storage and constants for media and cancellation windows.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module transforms old product records to include the new category field and maps old actor state to the updated structure.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and behavior of all key frontend files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base theme with extensive CSS variables for light and dark modes and global styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the app root and loading the main TypeScript bundle.
frontend/src/App.tsx: App router and layout setup using TanStack Router with lazy-loaded pages, theme provider, and profile setup modal logic.
frontend/src/components/admin/CarouselMa: Admin interface for editing up to five homepage carousel slides, including image upload, optimization, URL updates, and ordering.
frontend/src/components/admin/CategoryCa: Admin tool for uploading, replacing, or removing category carousel images with optimization and batched saving.
frontend/src/components/admin/InquiryMan: Admin panel for viewing customer inquiries and sending responses, with inline replying and status indicators.
frontend/src/components/admin/OrderManag: Displays orders, formats details, updates order statuses, and provides printable order views.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProductFor: Modal form for creating or editing products with media upload, optimization, and validation.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProductMan: Lists products with edit and delete actions and opens the product form modal for management.
frontend/src/components/admin/SiteConten: Form to view and update site-wide content such as contact info, policies, and static text.
frontend/src/components/CategoryCarousel: Renders an auto-rotating category carousel with hover pause, navigation, and slide transitions based on fetched category slides.
frontend/src/components/CategoryImageCar: Displays a category-specific image carousel with auto-rotation, hover pause, and validation for category slugs.
frontend/src/components/CustomerPageStyl: Wraps children in a scoped div used to style customer-facing pages.
frontend/src/components/footer/FooterSys: Footer component showing brand lockup, contact info, policies, and optional footer text.
frontend/src/components/HomeCarousel.tsx: Implements the homepage carousel with auto-play, slide transitions, loading skeleton, and click-through behavior.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Defines the main site layout with header navigation, authentication handling, category routing, and footer integration.
frontend/src/components/OrderDetailModal: Modal showing order details, status, and cancellation flow with reason selection and backend mutation.
frontend/src/components/ProductMediaCaro: Renders a carousel that displays video first then images, with navigation and lazy loading. Handles empty media and manages active slide state.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal form for collecting and saving user profile data with validation and query invalidation. Displays toasts and blocks closing until submission completes.
frontend/src/components/RouteLoadingFall: Shows skeleton placeholders while lazy-loaded routes are fetched. Includes header and grid-style content skeletons.
frontend/src/components/StripeSetupModal: Placeholder file with no implemented component.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminUiBodyAttribu: Adds a body attribute to enable admin-specific styling while admin routes are active.
frontend/src/hooks/useCart.ts: Zustand store managing cart items with add, remove, update, clear, and total calculation, persisted in storage.
frontend/src/hooks/useCategoryCarouselQu: React Query hooks for fetching and updating category-specific carousel images via actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/useFooterVariant.ts: Simple hook returning a constant 'split' footer variant.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, handling login, stored identity loading, and status tracking using AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for user profiles, admin checks, carousel operations, and various backend data fetch/mutation actions.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base plus extensive CSS variables defining a luxury-themed color system for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, QueryClientProvider, and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Admin dashboard page showing access control, statistics, and management tabs for products, orders, inquiries, and content.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Displays the user's cart, handles login gating, shows cart items with quantity controls, pricing, and navigation to checkout or products.
frontend/src/pages/categories/AnkletsPag: Empty placeholder page file for the Anklets category.
frontend/src/pages/categories/BridalJewe: Empty placeholder page file for the Bridal Jewellery category.
frontend/src/pages/categories/CategoryNo: Empty placeholder page file for a category-not-found view.
frontend/src/pages/categories/CategoryPa: Reusable template for category pages with product grid, carousels, and cart interactions.
frontend/src/pages/categories/EarringsPa: Empty placeholder page file for the Earrings category.
frontend/src/pages/categories/LabGrownDi: Category page using the template to show lab-grown diamond jewellery items.
frontend/src/pages/categories/NecklacePa: Empty placeholder page file for the Necklace category.
Empty placeholder page file for the Rings category.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Handles the checkout flow including address entry, UPI payment, order creation, and cart clearing with authentication enforcement.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Provides an authenticated contact form allowing users to submit inquiries with name, email, and message via backend mutation.
frontend/src/pages/CustomerDashboardPage: Shows authenticated users their orders and inquiries with status indicators and order detail modal support.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays homepage carousels and product listings with add‑to‑cart and buy‑now actions requiring login.
frontend/src/pages/OrdersPage.tsx: Empty placeholder file for an orders page.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailurePage.ts: Empty placeholder file for a payment failure page.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccessPage.ts: Empty placeholder file for a payment success page.
frontend/src/pages/ProductCategoryPage.t: Displays products for a given category with carousels, authentication checks, and cart actions.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailPage.tsx: Shows detailed product info with media carousel, quantity controls, and purchase/cart actions.
frontend/src/utils/mediaOptimization.ts: Provides client-side image resizing/compression and basic video preview handling.
frontend/src/utils/productCategories.ts: Defines product categories and helper functions for category lookup and validation.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters with session persistence.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme with extended OKLCH-based color system, container settings, plugins, and custom radii and shadows.
project_state.json: Defines current project state for UI updates, listing implemented features and pending requests related to header label, dropdown transparency, and category carousels.
